name: uzumejs
description: uzumejs is a thin wrapper of the vocoder, WORLD. WORLD is high-quality speech analysis, manipulation and synthesis system by mmorise. See more: https://github.com/mmorise/World
author: Hal@shurabaP

scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist && rimraf resources && mkdir resources
scripts.build:wasm: docker exec -w /uzuem_src uzumejs_wasm ./build.sh bash && cp ./wasm/build/uzumewasm.wasm ./resources && cp ./wasm/build/uzumewasm.js ./resources && cp ./wasm/build/uzumewasm.d.ts ./resources
